description:
The former Guntank pilot has become a leader of the terrestrial Karaba resistance group, operating a secret command post from his aerospace museum at the Kennedy Space Center. After the AEUG`s Jaburo assault, Hayato takes charge of the captured transport plane Audhumla and turns it into a mobile headquarters for the rebel forces. Thanks to the leadership of "Director Hayato," Karaba`s small force proves to be a valuable complement to the AEUG`s space fleet.
Source: Official Site
After the events of Gundam 0079, Hayato marries Fraw Bow and they adopt Katz, Letz and Kikka.
name: Hayato Kobayashi
